extensionDescription.message: Saves {image, video, audio, links, selection, page} in directories relative to the default download directory.

contextMenuItemOptions.description: Title of context menu item that opens the options menu when clicked.

contextMenuExclusive.description: Name for menu item when in exclusive mode.

contextMenuRoot.description: Name for root context menu item.

contextMenuLastUsed.description: Placeholder title for last used option.

contextMenuContextMedia.description: Indicator that Save In is saving just media.

contextMenuContextMediaOrLink.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a media or link.

contextMenuContextSelection.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a selection.

contextMenuContextPage.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a page.

contextMenuShowDefaultFolder.description: Title of context menu item that opens the default downloads directory in the system file manager when clicked.
